text: Miguel Picazo (27 March 1927 - 23 April 2016) was a Spanish movie director, screenwriter and actor. He is best known for directing his first movie La TÃ­a Tula (Aunt Tula) (1964). He was also an actor. He was in The Spirit of the Beehive (1973) and Tesis (1996). He retired in 1997. Picazo died in Madrid, Spain on 23 April 2016, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Spanish movie directors Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish screenwriters
title: Miguel Picazo
